description: CMD-OS 1.2.0 (CMD for OpenStack) is a minor update of the Cloud Middleware Distribution. This release includes updates for use with OpenStack Mitaka and above, on CentOS7 and Ubuntu 16 (Xenial).
releaseNotes: This update includes the following products for CentOS7 and Ubuntu 16: <br><br><ul><li>cloudkeeper 1.6.0 (NEW) - Cloudkeeper checks the EGI App DB for new or updated images that need to be supported on the site. It downloads images and registers them with OpenNebula, so that they can be used in resource instantiation.</li><li>cloudkeeper-os 0.9.9 (NEW) - Cloudkeeper-os is able to manage OpenStack cloud - upload, update and remove images and templates representing EGI AppDB appliances. cloudkeeper-os runs as a server listening for gRPC communication usually from core cloudkeeper component.</li><li>cloud-info-provider 0.9.1 - makes OCCI optional, avoiding failures if no OCCI endpoint is configured; updates on documentation, now stored on a dedicated EGI Foundation github store</li></ul>
installationNotes: All products in CMD-OS 1.2.0 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (<a href="https://ggus.eu/">https://ggus.eu/</a>) to make a report.
changeLog: This release contains an update for the cloud information provider and a new product, cloudkeeper. Please check the release notes for further details.

products.name: cesnet.cloudkeeper-os
products.description: Cloudkeeper-os is able to manage OpenStack cloud - upload, update and remove images and templates representing EGI AppDB appliances. cloudkeeper-os runs as a server listening for gRPC communication usually from core cloudkeeper component.

products.name: infoprovider.cloud-info-provider
products.description: GLUE2 BDII info provider for cloud services
